languages.text: "Нет. Мутит так, что сдохнуть хочется. Голоса опять со мной, и после того как я глоточек тишины отведала, они, кажется, звучат еще более оглушительно и рьяно. Лучше бы вы меня там оставили, хоть подохла бы спокойно..." {n}Поняв, что ляпнула, {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкерша{/g} виновато смотрит на вас.{/n} "Простите, Лорд-капитан, я не имела этого в виду. Просто погано мне, вот и разнылась".

traits.locale_text: "Нет. Мутит так, что сдохнуть хочется. Голоса опять со мной, и после того как я глоточек тишины отведала, они, кажется, звучат еще более оглушительно и рьяно. Лучше бы вы меня там оставили, хоть подохла бы спокойно..." {n}Поняв, что ляпнула, {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкерша{/g} виновато смотрит на вас.{/n} "Простите, Лорд-капитан, я не имела этого в виду. Просто погано мне, вот и разнылась".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "No. I feel so sick I want to die. The voices are back, and after having that little taste of quiet, they seem more deafening and intense than ever. I wish you'd just left me there, at least then I would have died peacefully..." {n}Realising what she just blurted out, the {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} shoots you a guilty look.{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain, I didn't mean that. I'm just moaning because I feel terrible."
languages.original_text: "Нет. Мутит так, что сдохнуть хочется. Голоса опять со мной, и после того как я глоточек тишины отведала, они, кажется, звучат еще более оглушительно и рьяно. Лучше бы вы меня там оставили, хоть подохла бы спокойно..." {n}Поняв, что ляпнула, {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкерша{/g} виновато смотрит на вас.{/n} "Простите, Лорд-капитан, я не имела этого в виду. Просто погано мне, вот и разнылась".

I'm just moaning because I feel terrible."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “不好，我感觉好难受，难受得要死。那些声音又回来了，他们尝到了安静的滋味之后，变得比以往更加强烈，更加震耳欲聋。你当时要是把我丢在那里就好了，至少那样我可以平静地死去……”{n}这个{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}猛然意识到自己刚刚说了什么，她朝你投来了愧疚的目光。{/n}“请原谅我，舰长大人，我不是这个意思。我只是在呻吟，因为我感觉很难受。”
languages.original_text: "No. I feel so sick I want to die. The voices are back, and after having that little taste of quiet, they seem more deafening and intense than ever. I wish you'd just left me there, at least then I would have died peacefully..." {n}Realising what she just blurted out, the {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} shoots you a guilty look.{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain, I didn't mean that. I'm just moaning because I feel terrible."

traits.locale_text: “不好，我感觉好难受，难受得要死。那些声音又回来了，他们尝到了安静的滋味之后，变得比以往更加强烈，更加震耳欲聋。你当时要是把我丢在那里就好了，至少那样我可以平静地死去……”{n}这个{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}猛然意识到自己刚刚说了什么，她朝你投来了愧疚的目光。{/n}“请原谅我，舰长大人，我不是这个意思。我只是在呻吟，因为我感觉很难受。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "No. I feel so sick I want to die. The voices are back, and after having that little taste of quiet, they seem more deafening and intense than ever. I wish you'd just left me there, at least then I would have died peacefully..." {n}Realising what she just blurted out, the psyker shoots you a guilty look.{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain, I didn't mean that. I'm just moaning because I feel terrible."

languages.text: «No. Me encuentro tan enferma que prefiero la muerte. Las voces han vuelto, y, después de haber probado la tranquilidad, me resultan más ensordecedoras e intensas que nunca. Ojalá me hubiera abandonado allí. Así al menos habría muerto en paz...». {n}Al comprender lo que acaba de decir, la {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquica{/g} te lanza una mirada culpable.{/n} «Discúlpeme, Lord Capitán, no quería decir eso. Solo me estoy quejando porque estoy fatal».
languages.original_text: "No. I feel so sick I want to die. The voices are back, and after having that little taste of quiet, they seem more deafening and intense than ever. I wish you'd just left me there, at least then I would have died peacefully..." {n}Realising what she just blurted out, the {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} shoots you a guilty look.{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain, I didn't mean that. I'm just moaning because I feel terrible."

traits.locale_text: «No. Me encuentro tan enferma que prefiero la muerte. Las voces han vuelto, y, después de haber probado la tranquilidad, me resultan más ensordecedoras e intensas que nunca. Ojalá me hubiera abandonado allí. Así al menos habría muerto en paz...». {n}Al comprender lo que acaba de decir, la {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquica{/g} te lanza una mirada culpable.{/n} «Discúlpeme, Lord Capitán, no quería decir eso. Solo me estoy quejando porque estoy fatal».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「いいえ、死にたいくらい気分が悪いわ。声が戻ってきてしまったし。静寂を少し味わった後では、これまで以上に耳をつんざくような激しい声になっているくらい。せめて穏やかに死にたかった…」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}は今自分がどんな言葉を漏らしたかに気づき、あなたに後ろめたそうな視線を送る。{/n}「許してちょうだい、ロード・キャプテン。そんなつもりじゃなかったの。恐ろしくてつい、こぼしてしまっただけで」
languages.original_text: "No. I feel so sick I want to die. The voices are back, and after having that little taste of quiet, they seem more deafening and intense than ever. I wish you'd just left me there, at least then I would have died peacefully..." {n}Realising what she just blurted out, the {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} shoots you a guilty look.{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain, I didn't mean that. I'm just moaning because I feel terrible."

traits.locale_text: 「いいえ、死にたいくらい気分が悪いわ。声が戻ってきてしまったし。静寂を少し味わった後では、これまで以上に耳をつんざくような激しい声になっているくらい。せめて穏やかに死にたかった…」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}は今自分がどんな言葉を漏らしたかに気づき、あなたに後ろめたそうな視線を送る。{/n}「許してちょうだい、ロード・キャプテン。そんなつもりじゃなかったの。恐ろしくてつい、こぼしてしまっただけで」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Nein. Ich fühle mich so krank, dass ich sterben will. Die Stimmen sind zurück, und nachdem sie einmal kurz von der Stille kosten konnten, sind sie nun ohrenbetäubender und wilder als je zuvor. Ich wünschte, Ihr hättet mich dort gelassen, dann wäre ich zumindest friedlich gestorben ..." {n}Als ihr klar wird, was ihr da eben herausgerutscht ist, blickt die {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psionikerin{/g} Euch schuldbewusst an.{/n} "Vergebt mir, Lord Captain, das meinte ich nicht ernst. Ich jammere nur, weil ich mich grauenhaft fühle."
languages.original_text: "No. I feel so sick I want to die. The voices are back, and after having that little taste of quiet, they seem more deafening and intense than ever. I wish you'd just left me there, at least then I would have died peacefully..." {n}Realising what she just blurted out, the {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} shoots you a guilty look.{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain, I didn't mean that. I'm just moaning because I feel terrible."

traits.locale_text: "Nein. Ich fühle mich so krank, dass ich sterben will. Die Stimmen sind zurück, und nachdem sie einmal kurz von der Stille kosten konnten, sind sie nun ohrenbetäubender und wilder als je zuvor. Ich wünschte, Ihr hättet mich dort gelassen, dann wäre ich zumindest friedlich gestorben ..." {n}Als ihr klar wird, was ihr da eben herausgerutscht ist, blickt die {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psionikerin{/g} Euch schuldbewusst an.{/n} "Vergebt mir, Lord Captain, das meinte ich nicht ernst. Ich jammere nur, weil ich mich grauenhaft fühle."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Non. Je suis tellement mal que franchement, la mort serait une libération. Les voix sont de retour, et après avoir eu un aperçu de ce que c'était le silence, j'ai l'impression qu'elles sont encore plus assourdissantes et intenses qu'avant. Vous auriez dû me laisser sur place. Au moins, je serais morte en paix... » {n}Quand elle se rend compte de ce qu'elle vient de dire, la {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} vous lance un regard coupable.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, je ne voulais pas dire ça. J'ai juste envie de me plaindre parce que je ne me sens pas bien. »
languages.original_text: "No. I feel so sick I want to die. The voices are back, and after having that little taste of quiet, they seem more deafening and intense than ever. I wish you'd just left me there, at least then I would have died peacefully..." {n}Realising what she just blurted out, the {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} shoots you a guilty look.{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain, I didn't mean that. I'm just moaning because I feel terrible."

traits.locale_text: « Non. Je suis tellement mal que franchement, la mort serait une libération. Les voix sont de retour, et après avoir eu un aperçu de ce que c'était le silence, j'ai l'impression qu'elles sont encore plus assourdissantes et intenses qu'avant. Vous auriez dû me laisser sur place. Au moins, je serais morte en paix... » {n}Quand elle se rend compte de ce qu'elle vient de dire, la {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} vous lance un regard coupable.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, je ne voulais pas dire ça. J'ai juste envie de me plaindre parce que je ne me sens pas bien. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Hayır. O kadar kötü hissediyorum ki ölmeyi yeğlerim. Sesler geri döndü. Daha sükûnetin tadına doyamadan böylesini hiç işitmediğim, kulakları sağır eden bir yoğunluğa eriştiler. Keşke beni orada bıraksaydın, en azından ölümümde huzuru tadardım." {n}Düşünmeden söylediği sözlerin farkına varan {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezer{/g}, suçluluk dolu bakışlarla seni süzüyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, affet beni. Kastettiğim bu değildi. Berbat hissettiğim için sızlanıyorum sadece."
languages.original_text: "No. I feel so sick I want to die. The voices are back, and after having that little taste of quiet, they seem more deafening and intense than ever. I wish you'd just left me there, at least then I would have died peacefully..." {n}Realising what she just blurted out, the {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} shoots you a guilty look.{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain, I didn't mean that. I'm just moaning because I feel terrible."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır. O kadar kötü hissediyorum ki ölmeyi yeğlerim. Sesler geri döndü. Sükûnetin tadına doyamamıştım ki böylesini hiç işitmediğim, kulakları sağır eden bir yoğunluğa eriştiler. Keşke beni orada bıraksaydın, en azından ölümümde huzuru tadardım." {n}Düşünmeden söylediği sözlerin farkına varan {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezer{/g}, suçluluk dolu bakışlarla seni süzüyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, affet beni. Kastettiğim bu değildi. Berbat hissettiğim için sızlanıyorum sadece."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
